H0.text: Which motor company owns the truck maker, Scania. Volkswagen

H1.text: Which motor company owns the truck maker, Scania. Daimler

H2.text: Which motor company owns the truck maker, Scania. Volvo

H3.text: Which motor company owns the truck maker, Scania. SAAB

A4.text: Scania is now majority owned by Volkswagen AG, making it part of Volkswagen Group.

A5.text: Scania is a subsidiary of Traton, part of the Volkswagen Group.
